A flag that indicates whether the identifier is from an archived item.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class by using the supplied format, identifier, mailbox SMTP address, and archive identifier flag.

remarks.para: This overload is applicable to clients that target versions of Microsoft Exchange Server starting with Exchange Server 2010 Service Pack 1 (SP1).
